name: Solar Group Inc E11BZ Bronze Elite Premium Steel Mailbox
categoryPath: Home Improvement/Hardware/Home Hardware/Door Hardware & Accessories/Mailboxes & Address Plaques

reviews.name: Solar Group Inc E11BZ Bronze Elite Premium Steel Mailbox
reviews.reviewText: Like the color...but would have liked a gloss finish better than the dull matt. The flag could be a little bit longer. The main issue that we had with it is that it did not "shut" unless you really slammed it hard or pushed on it hard. No mail carrier in their right mind would sit there & fidget that much to get it to close so We had to bend the lip some to get it to shut thus the average rating.
reviews.title: it was ok

reviews.name: Solar Group Inc E11BZ Bronze Elite Premium Steel Mailbox
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this mailbox as a "card box" for our upcoming wedding. It was better than I had imagined. Definitely worth the money spent, and it can double for it's real purpose later in life.
reviews.title: Great product

reviews.name: Solar Group Inc E11BZ Bronze Elite Premium Steel Mailbox
reviews.reviewText: Great very solid and sturdy. Looks beautiful.
reviews.title: Great product

reviews.name: Solar Group Inc E11BZ Bronze Elite Premium Steel Mailbox
reviews.reviewText: I love this mailbox. I love the color and think it's a great well made product!
reviews.title: Perfect for the Price!

reviews.name: Solar Group Inc E11BZ Bronze Elite Premium Steel Mailbox
reviews.reviewText: The color is darker than it looks on th picture, but I really like it. It's closer to a brown. Good quality, great price!
reviews.title: Love it!
